item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: <p> <img src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif"</a>> Thanks for the card - glad you are enjoying trip. Bank Holiday weekend here and Dad off to Sancerre on Tuesday. Better start exercising that brain a bit so that you function on return!!<br/></p>
item.content:encoded: http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$FILE/smile.gif“> Thanks for the card – glad you are enjoying trip. Bank Holiday weekend here and Dad off to Sancerre on Tuesday. Better start exercising that brain a bit so that you function on return!!
